H0.text: Electrolysis is the most direct way of recovering a metal from its ores.

H1.text: Drilling is the most direct way of recovering a metal from its ores.

H2.text: Molecules are the most direct way of recovering a metal from its ores.

H3.text: Osmosis is the most direct way of recovering a metal from its ores.

A4.text: Electrowinning is an electrolysis process used to recover metals in aqueous solution, usually as the result of an ore having undergone one or more hydrometallurgical processes.
